forgotPassword.EnterUsername: Enter your username and will send you an email with a link to recover your password. Please, remember check your Spam folder.

disclaimer.Title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.Content:
It is assumed, that you have given your consent for the information in your medical history to be entrusted to the Motiv company, who will ensure its secrecy and correct use for the benefit of yourself.

It is estimated that the facts and information entered by yourself, they are accurate at the time they were uploaded to this Website.
If you have questions about your medical record, want to obtain a copy or notice something that should be modified, please contact us:

tracker.Title: Test COVID-19
tracker.TemperatureDescription: Please, tell us what is your body temperature
tracker.BreathingDescription: Do you feel any degree of difficulty in your breathing?
tracker.OxygenDescription: Do you feel any degree of oxygen saturation?
tracker.CoughDescription: Please tell us what is your cough level
tracker.SmellDescription: Do you feel any degree of loss of smell?

SkipModal.Question: How are you feeling today?
